title: Titan RTX Setup
content: The Titan RTX is a workstation-class GPU with 24GB of VRAM. It is ideal for running local LLMs like DeepSeek-Coder-V2 and handling large context windows in RAG applications.

title: 3L Architecture
content: The 3rd Layer (3L) architecture focuses on local-first processing, utilizing workstation hardware for primary inference (L1) and cloud resources for escalation (L2).
